revised_title: Obituary of Mr. Le Gros Clark
tldr: This article is an obituary for Mr. Le Gros Clark, a prominent surgeon and anatomy lecturer. It details his life, education, and career, highlighting his contributions to medical education and his impact on the medical community. Mr. Le Gros Clark was a skilled surgeon, devoted Christian, and a dedicated teacher who made significant contributions to the field of medicine.
